title: Javelins
content:
Javelins in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Javelins are Thrown Simple Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-6 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Piercing Damage.

Many Javelins have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Javelins in BG3. This Weapon Action Piercing Strike.
